articles.author: Hank Tucker
articles.title: Private Equity Firms Celebrate Trump’s Executive Order Giving Them The Keys To Retirement - Forbes
articles.description: Private asset managers have been tantalized for years about the $29 trillion in Americans’ retirement accounts. Donald Trump just made it easier for them to get a slice.
articles.content:
Donald Trump directed his Secretary of Labor Thursday to reevaluate past guidance on 401(k) regulation in a win for private equity that could unlock trillions in assets.
